archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.4.2b: b) comply with good coding practice (e.g. using structured programming techniques, secure coding practices specific to the programming languages being used, documenting code and removing programming defects, which may allow security vulnerabilities to be exploited)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
